StringVectorProperty.name: ScalarField
StringVectorProperty.label: Scalar Field
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select the scalar field to process.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Tolerance
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Topological loss (persistence percentage)
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Topological loss expressed as a persistence threshold (normalized between 0 and 100).

DoubleVectorProperty.name: MaximumError
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Maximum pointwise error (percentage)
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the maximum allowed pointwise error (in percentage of the function span).

IntVectorProperty.name: ZFPBitBudget
IntVectorProperty.label: ZFP bit budget (extra)
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Additionally compress the data with ZFP for improved geometrical quality (number of bits per vertex).

IntVectorProperty.name: ZFPOnly
IntVectorProperty.label: Use ZFP compressor only (no topological compression)

IntVectorProperty.name: UseTopologicalSimplification
IntVectorProperty.label: Simplify at compression (slower)
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable topological simplification at compression time (higher compression factors, slower compression time).

IntVectorProperty.name: SQMethod
IntVectorProperty.label: Use SQ compressor only (no topological compression)
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Use SQ instead of topological compression.
